Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: In this report , we demonstrate in cultured 293 cells overexpressing wild - type or mutant HFE proteins that both the wild - type and H63D HFE proteins form stable complexes with the transferrin receptor ( TfR ) .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| HFE proteins (mutant) |

Explanation:
The text mentions "mutant HFE proteins" which implies that there is a disease or genetic mutation associated with HFE proteins. However, the specific disease is not mentioned in the text. Therefore, I can only identify "mutant HFE proteins" as a disease entity.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| HFE proteins (mutant) |

Explanation:
The text mentions "mutant HFE proteins" which implies that there is a disease or genetic mutation associated with HFE proteins. Therefore, I have identified "mutant HFE proteins" as a disease entity. I have removed "wild-type HFE proteins" as it is a normal form of the protein and not a disease. Similarly, "transferrin receptor (TfR)" is a protein and not a disease.
